EmailTemplate.name: Contact Us Confirmation EMEA
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Pivotal. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible. If you have a technical support question, you may find it easier to visit Pivotal Support <[[https://support.pivotal.io]]>.
While you wait, learn how good companies become great by becoming a digital disruptor and read best practices for building transformational software today…and tomorrow!
A few places to get started:
- Subscribe to our weekly newsletter <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/newsletter-archive.html]]>, featuring podcasts, blog posts, videos, events, and company news. - Learn about SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, the premier conference for developers & operators who build, deploy, and run cloud native software. - Watch a one minute overview <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=f-H1aJJpm0U]]> on Pivotal, or check out our customer page <[[https://pivotal.io/customers]]> to learn how enterprises across industries are turning to Pivotal to transform the way they build and release products, drive decisions, and interact with customers.
Get Started with Pivotal <[[https://pivotal.io/get-started]]> by creating an account to access product downloads, training, and a free trial of Pivotal Web Services or explore our resource center <[[https://pivotal.io/resources]]>.
We look forward to speaking with you soon, The Pivotal Team
